About

We help brands deliver targeted mobile offers.

Koupon Media is the industry leader in cloud based mobile offer management. Our platform helps retailers create, manage and deliver highly targeted mobile offers to customers across multiple distribution channels. Some of the world’s largest retailers use Koupon-powered offers to drive store traffic, boost mobile engagement, and understand customer preferences.

We help you get the most out of our platform

Client Success Team

Our dedicated Client Success Managers can help retailers with every step of the process. From upfront training to implementation and ongoing support, our experts specialize in helping retailers realize the full potential of mobile offers.

Custom Integration

Our Custom Integration team has deep rooted experience in connecting our offer technology with POS, Loyalty, and CRM systems to improve targeting, increase.

Strategic Data Analysis

Koupon’s platform collects a large amount of valuable customer and offer-related information. Our Data Science Team can help retailers develop success metrics, analyze trends or build custom reports to suit business objectives.

Get in Touch

Learn how Koupon can help you be more successful at delivering mobile offers

Our Team

TJ Person is CEO and founder of Koupon Media. The Company works with various top Retailers and Brands including 7 Eleven, Pepsi, and Michaels, just to name a few. Having started Koupon Media in 2011, Person is notably one of two entrepreneur advisors for Startup America in Texas and was awarded Dallas 40 under 40 in 2012. Person is a seasoned entrepreneur with 15+ years of mobile experience, notably as co-founder and president of Mango Mobile. In 2005 Mango Mobile raised $1.5 million and after 2 years as the fastest growing mobile marketing company Omnicom Group acquired it in February 2007. TJ spent several years with Omnicom where Mango continues as a leader in the mobile space.
